ValidationRule.description: Making the “Deal” field mandatory when creating a Committed Upsell opportunity.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Business_Type__c,"Committed Upsell"), ISBLANK(Deal__c), $Profile.Name<>$Label.Data_Loader_Profile_Name, OR( RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Direct_Record_Type', RecordType.DeveloperName == 'Indirect_Record_Type' ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please associate this opportunity with an existing Upsell Deal.
